description: Inspects the input text for entities that contain personally identifiable information (PII) and returns information about them.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: A UTF-8 text string. The maximum string size is 100 KB.

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: The language of the input text. Enter the language code for English (en) or Spanish (es).

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: A collection of PII entities identified in the input text. For each entity, the response provides the entity type, where the entity text begins and ends, and the level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the detection.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of the detection.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the first character in the entity.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the source text to the last character in the entity.
